channel.title: Doubts on IsipTala
channel.description: Recent content in Doubts on IsipTala

item.title: the uncertainty of everything
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Lyka Sebelina)
item.description:
-Written By Apollyon

Has the uncertainty of the world ever crossed your mind? What will happen in the future? I often ponder what the future holds and I always believe in the saying “It is what it is.”

item.title: Who am I ?!
item.author: sample@gmail.com (Lyka Sebelina)
item.description:
-Written By Bino

Who am I ?! This is the most asked question in my life. Yet no clear answer has yet been found.

As a child, the answer to this question was simple. Say my name to the question of who. Aha ..! Simple and beautiful. In that answer, parents and siblings in adolescence. I thought to myself that the answer was too clear.
